name: Sol Jandia Mar Aparthotel

reviews.text: We have stayed at these apartments five or six times over the last few years. We have always been happy to come back - until this time. The apartment we were given P242 was in the furthest block - it was right next to the main road to Morro Jable, which for a small place has traffic backward and forwards 24 hours a day! It sounded like being on the M1! The apartment balcony had absolutely no view whatsoever except for some tree branches. The bedrooms looked out onto the space that is used for the hotel's rubbish. This meant that if the bin wagon hadn't woken us up at 5.00 a.m. on it's regular visit, the workmen from the apartments refilling the rubbish bins from 7.30 would have - not the sound of their work but their very loud conversations outside the window as they stopped for a ciggie break. (why do the Spanish always have to shout at each other???) None of this made for a relaxing night's sleep. In addition, the room was not cleaned ONCE during our stay, neither were the sheets changed. Towels were placed in the room each day but were just left there (the dirty ones werent taken away!) so we were left with about 15 towels in the room by the end of the week!!!! The cooking utensils etc.. and general state of the room were grubby.
reviews.title: Our last visit to this place!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: After being happy previously, we are upset to see this place go downhill like this. Talk about the block of apartments that was forgotten! We can't even say that this treatment was reserved for the British because we had German & Scandinavian neighbours who got similalry poor treatment. A German customer satisfaction questionnaire had been left on our table from the previous week & the criticisms were damning (I speak Greman). When we first read it at the start of the holiday we thought it was hyper critical - by the end of the week we agreed with everything written. Jandia is a lovely relaxing resort, miles away from the awful 'British' resorts of the north of the island, so we will go back - not to the Sol Jandia Mar however. If you go and they tell you you are in P242 - tell them NO WAY JOSE!!!!!!
reviews.title: Great value, clean & friendly

likes.disliked: — Entertainment - but didn't really experience it

reviews.text: My boyfriend and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay at Sol Jandia Mar apartments. We received a warm welcome and found the all staff to be very friendly, as were the other guests. Our apartment was clean and less basic than we had expected for the price. It was great value! We only ate twice at the hotel. The breakfast was quite good value but not exceptional. The other meal was a BBQ by the pool which was tasty and good value. We enjoyed the variety of having meals out at some of the many cafes and restaurants in Jandia and Morro Jable.
reviews.title: price>kwalitie>ok
loved sol jandia mar
reviews.text: We didn't experience any of the hotel entertainment and it didn't sound to be our cup of tea, but they did have a wide range on offer like bingo, a magician, a champagne night and a disco night. They also had a varied programme of sporting and exercise activities.

We're both mobile, but for those who aren't I'd recommend requesting a ground floor apartment as there don't seem to be any lifts. Even then there is one flight of steep steps to climb to get up to the level of the apartments. We had requested a sea view, so we had 3 flights of stairs to climb. Absolutely fine and worth it for us, but a point to note for those less mobile.
reviews.title: lovely & clean

likes.disliked: — kitchen only had hob no grill/oven

description: Sol Jandía Mar ApartHotel is situated about 150 meters to the nearest beach,Playa de Jandía,with fine white sand.Sol Jandía Mar offers 294 comfortable appartments overlooking the beach,the pool and the beautiful gardens arround the hotel.The complex offers Restaurant,Snack Pool Bar and Lounge Bar.The maritim avenue connects the aparthotel with the shopping area at Jandía and the fishing village, Morro del Jable.
